alert.note: Alert for La Salle; McMullen (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Corpus Christi (Corpus Cristi, Victoria and Laredo)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 07 at 5:11PM CDT by NWS Corpus Christi
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northern La Salle and northwestern McMullen Counties through 545 PM CDT... At 511 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 10 miles east of Dilley, moving south at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Cotulla, Millett, Los Angeles, Gardendale, Zella and Fowlerton. This includes Interstate 35 between mile markers 62 and 82. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
